section.title: Report
section.para: This was created using the June 9, 2008 build of GMAT.

section.title: Overview
section.para: The report command allows the user find parameters of the orbit and the spacecraft at particular moments in time. This command is inserted into the mission tree at various locations in the mission tree. The parameters found by this command are placed into a report file that can be accessed at a later time.

section.title: Listing of Objects and Commands that interact

listitem.para: Object where the parameters retrieved by the report command.

section.title: Using the GUI
section.para: The report command has two main boxes. The first box allows one to select which report the parameters will be stored in. The second box interacts with the ParameterSelectDialog and allows the user to pick which parameters are desired to be seen at that particular moment.

entry.para: The ReportName option allows the user to specift the ReportFile for data output.
The DataList option allows the user to output data to the Filename specified by the ReportName. Multiple objects can be in the DataList when they are separated by spaces.
